name: portfolio
description: The project intended to be a showcase of mine and my work. Here you can find my short life timeline and projects that I managed to create during my front-end path. This project contains some things which I'd like to show by this portfolio besides my bio: - SCSS (mixins, variables), - Responsiveness, - Responsive menu ("Burger"), - Neumorphism, - Converting JS code to be compatibile with all browsers.
